DPRK Ambassador to Libya Appointed 
   Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Tong Je was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Libya, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Visit E-Library
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Visit E-Library 
   Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Jalaleddin Namini Mianji and staff members of the Iranian embassy here Thursday visited the E-Library of Kim Chaek University of Technology on the occasion of a week for DPRK-Iran friendship.
 They went round reading rooms, remote controlled-lecture hall and other rooms, being briefed on the fact that all the services at the library, from the retrieval of booklists to reading books and data and lectures, are computerized.    
 After the visit the ambassador expressed belief that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous powerful nation by developing science and technology under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

Syrian Government Economic Delegation Here
articles.content:
Syrian Government Economic Delegation Here
   Pyongyang, May 12 (KCNA) -- A Syrian government economic delegation led by Amer Hosni Lutfi, minister of Economy and Commerce, arrived here Friday. 
 It was greeted at the airport by Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and Muhammad Adib Al Hani, Syrian charge d'affaires ad interim in Pyongyang.    
 The government of the DPRK hosted a reception for the delegation this evening.
